doc:
Bobby Van https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Van 0 Robert Jack Stein, better known by his stage name Bobby Van (December 6, 1928 – July 31, 1980) was a musical actor, best known for his career on Broadway, in films and television from the 1950s through the 1970s. He was also a game show host and panelist. Robert_Jack_Stein , better_known by his_stage_name_Bobby_Van ( December_6_,_1928 – July_31_,_1980 ) was a_musical_actor , best_known for his_career on Broadway , in films and television from the_1950s through the_1970s . He was also a_game_show_host_and_panelist .
